page.title: 10 LEEK GROWING
page.content: Leek growing started off in this area when 10 keen gardeners got together to see who could grow the biggest leek.A Mr.D.Cunningham was the founder of the competions. Leeks are planted in June ready for October.They need constant attention and many growers have magic recipes.A good speciman must be 5-6 inches from thebottom of the leek to the button.The Leek must be cleaned and the beard left on then polished for show. Over 20 years in the area about 20-25 people enter the shows regularly aeach show is usually linked to a Public House or a Club e.g.Grey Horse,Blue Bell etc.Prizes range from household goods to Colour Televisions.
